nodes.text: D.M. Skecher was an individual who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He was apparently some sort of artist or designer, because it was said that The Hilltop structure on Tatooine looked similar to his work.

In the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, players can complete a collection called "Panoramic Vistas." In this collection, players were given a clue as to how to find a place called "The Hilltop," stating that it looked similar to the work of D.M. Skecher.
The name D.M. Skecher is probably a tongue-in-cheek reference to the real life M.C. Escher.
